title: The RPG style Watch face
summary: Smart Watch（Android Wear） face of the RPG style
description: It is a smart watch for face of RPG -style dot picture taste .Brave will earnestly advance the field .Because the background changes in, for example, time zone , please do a little enjoying the change .* Currently recommended terminal *SmartWatch3---Not compatible with Fossil Watches[Function ]1 : You have a digital clock is always displayed .2 : You are next to the battery remaining amount of the digital clock is always displayed .※ bonus : a few days after installation , fellow will continue to increase.( Re- set the face , will be reset . )
descriptionHTML:
It is a smart watch for face of RPG -style dot picture taste .

Brave will earnestly advance the field .

Because the background changes in, for example, time zone , please do a little enjoying the change .

* Currently recommended terminal *
SmartWatch3
---Not compatible with Fossil Watches

[Function ]
1 : You have a digital clock is always displayed .

2 : You are next to the battery remaining amount of the digital clock is always displayed .
※ bonus : a few days after installation , fellow will continue to increase.
( Re- set the face , will be reset . )
comments: Great little watch face, I'm still trying to figure out how to mess with the setting like for the time format, my only issue is that in the background as he is walking there is a huge part of it in the right side that is black, like a big black box. If there is a way to send a picture I will.
Very cool little watch face. I love it.
